name: LazerKick
description:
So you're looking for a new spaceship?

Are you sick and tired of not getting knocked back to Gavin IV every time you shoot your laser cannon? Well then, I have the cruisers for you! Come on! Take your pick: the Mk1 or the Mk2. Oh you're not so sure? Why don't you step inside, see how they look. You can kick back, relax, and explode on a wall with your unconventional thrusters and sub-par flying skills.  But no worries! They're a dime a dozen - I can get you a replacement in a jiffy!

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space to shoot, Esc to open the pause menu

LazerKick is a challenging physics-based space battler. The turning, thrusting, and kickback take time to get used to, but are gratifying to master. Fight in a close-quarters clash or join an all-out chaotic war.

I made this game in collaboration with @Bonqe - who created all of the Music and sound effects along with giving a helping hand in Unity. Take a look at his soundcloud here: https://soundcloud.com/bonqe/ And the main menu music can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/bonqe/no-sound-in-space

If you're having any performance issues with the game, download the windows version! It comes with fullscreen :)
